# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdno-driver-huawei-servicechain-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/sdno/driver-huawei-servicechain/servicechaindriverservice-deployment/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/servicechaindriverservice-deployment-1.1.0-20161030.131744-11.zip" && unzip -q -o -B sdno-driver-huawei-servicechain-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip && rm -f sdno-driver-huawei-servicechain-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip
EXPOSE 8542
RUN echo Open-O sdno-driver-huawei-servicechain 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/sdno/driver-huawei-servicechain/servicechaindriverservice-deployment/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/servicechaindriverservice-deployment-1.1.0-20161030.131744-11.zip" > OPENO_VERSION
